name: Waldo Jaquith
title: Board Member
bio: Waldo Jaquith is with 18Fâ€™s State and Local Acquisitions practice, working with governments across the U.S. to help them better acquire software to serve the needs of the public. Previously, he was the Senior Advisor to the Sunlight Foundation, Director of the Knight-funded U.S. Open Data, ran the Knight-funded State Decoded project, and worked for the White House Office of Science and Technology. He serves as an advisor to and on the board of various organizations that sit at the intersection of technology and government.
